message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing it if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1100000. This price still reflects the product's value to me, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering our previous discussions.

I appreciate your willingness to make a counteroffer, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price of $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm eager to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1050000. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1080000. This price still reflects the product's value to me, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering our previous discussions.

I understand that you're still holding firm on the price, Alice. However, I'm not willing to go above $1100000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer of $1070000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm eager to come to an agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1070000. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1100000. This price is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
